00055 namespace harps {
00060   class DynamicMonophony {
00061     public:
00065       DynamicMonophony() : clock ( 1.0 / static_cast< double > ( SAMPLING_RATE ) ) {}
00069       virtual ~DynamicMonophony() {}
00074       template< typename SampleType >
00075       inline void operator() ( Buffer< SampleType > &_buffer ) {
00076         ( *module ) ( _buffer, clock, note );
00077         clock.tick ( SAMPLE_COUNT );
00078       }
00085       inline int noteOn ( int _note, float _touch ) {
00086         clock.noteOn ( _note );
00087         note.noteOn ( _touch );
00088         return 0;
00089       }
00094       inline void noteOff ( int _dummy = 0 ) {
00095         clock.noteOff();
00096         note.noteOff();
00097       }
00102       inline void noteWait ( int _dummy = 0 ) {
00103         note.noteWait();
00104       }
00109       inline void setPitchBend ( float _pitch ) {
00110         clock.setPitchBend ( _pitch );
00111       }
00115       inline void reset() {
00116         clock.reset();
00117       }
00122       inline Note::NoteState getStatus() const {
00123         return note.getStatus();
00124       }
00129       inline double getGlobalTime() {
00130         return clock.getTime< 0 > ( 0 );
00131       }
00136       void programChange ( const char *_filename ) {
00137         module.reset ( new DynamicModuleSlot ( _filename ) );
00138       }
00139     private:
00140       boost::shared_ptr< DynamicModuleSlot > module;
00141       CurrentTime clock;
00142       Note note;
00143   };
00144 
00149   template< typename MonophonyType, unsigned int max_polyphony >
00150   class DynamicPolyphony {
00151     public:
00155       DynamicPolyphony() : current_note_id ( 0 ), default_pitch ( 0.0f ), clock ( 1.0 / static_cast< double > ( SAMPLING_RATE ) ) {
00156         int monophony_index;
00157         for ( monophony_index = 0; monophony_index != max_polyphony; monophony_index++ )
00158           active_since[ monophony_index ] = 0;
00159       }
00163       virtual ~DynamicPolyphony() {}
00168       template< typename SampleType >
00169       void operator() ( Buffer< SampleType > &_buffer ) {
00170         typename Buffer< SampleType >::SampleType *raw_buffer = _buffer.get();
00171         int sample_index;
00172         for ( sample_index = 0; sample_index != SAMPLE_COUNT; sample_index++ )
00173           raw_buffer[ sample_index ] = 0.0f;
00174 
00175         Buffer< SampleType > temp_buffer[ max_polyphony ];
00176         int monophony_index;
00177         tbb::parallel_for ( tbb::blocked_range< unsigned int > ( 0, max_polyphony, 4 ),
00178                        Renderer< SampleType > ( monophony, temp_buffer ) );
00179         for ( monophony_index = 0; monophony_index != max_polyphony; monophony_index++ ) {
00180           for ( sample_index = 0; sample_index != SAMPLE_COUNT; sample_index++ )
00181             if ( temp_buffer[ monophony_index ].getUsed() )
00182               raw_buffer[ sample_index ] += temp_buffer[ monophony_index ].get() [ sample_index ];
00183         }
00184 
00185         Buffer< SampleType > amp_buffer;
00186         int index;
00187         typename Buffer< SampleType >::SampleType *raw_amp_buffer = amp_buffer.get();
00188         for ( sample_index = 0; sample_index != SAMPLE_COUNT; sample_index++ ) {
00189           normalizer.setValue ( raw_buffer[ sample_index ] );
00190           raw_amp_buffer[ sample_index ] = normalizer.getAmp();
00191         }
00192         reduceNormalizingNoize ( amp_buffer );
00193         for ( sample_index = 0; sample_index != SAMPLE_COUNT; sample_index++ )
00194           raw_buffer[ sample_index ] /= raw_amp_buffer[ sample_index ];
00195 
00196         clock.tick ( SAMPLE_COUNT );
00197       }
00204       inline int noteOn ( int _note, float _touch ) {
00205         int monophony_id = getNewMonophony();
00206         if ( monophony_id == -1 )
00207           monophony_id = killOldMonophony();
00208         monophony[ monophony_id ].noteOn ( _note, _touch );
00209         monophony[ monophony_id ].setPitchBend ( default_pitch );
00210         current_note_id++;
00211         active_since[ monophony_id ] = current_note_id;
00212         return current_note_id;
00213       }
00218       inline void noteOff ( int _note_id ) {
00219         int monophony_id = findMonophony ( _note_id );
00220         if ( monophony_id != -1 )
00221           monophony[ monophony_id ].noteOff();
00222       }
00228       inline void setPitchBend ( int _note_id, float _pitch ) {
00229         int monophony_id = findMonophony ( _note_id );
00230         if ( monophony_id != -1 )
00231           monophony[ monophony_id ].setPitchBend ( _pitch );
00232       }
00237       inline void setPitchBend ( float _pitch ) {
00238         int index;
00239         default_pitch = _pitch;
00240         for ( index = 0; index != max_polyphony; index++ )
00241           monophony[ index ].setPitchBend ( default_pitch );
00242       }
00246       inline void reset() {
00247         int index;
00248         current_note_id = 0;
00249         default_pitch = 0.0f;
00250         for ( index = 0; index != max_polyphony; index++ )
00251           monophony[ index ].reset();
00252         clock.reset();
00253       }
00259       inline int findMonophony ( int _note_id ) {
00260         int index;
00261         for ( index = 0; index != max_polyphony; index++ )
00262           if ( active_since[ index ] == _note_id )
00263             return index;
00264         return -1;
00265       }
00270       inline double getGlobalTime() {
00271         return clock.template getTime< 0 > ( 0 );
00272       }
00277       void programChange ( const char *_filename ) {
00278         int index;
00279         for ( index = 0; index != max_polyphony; index++ )
00280           monophony[ index ].programChange ( _filename );
00281       }
00282     private:
00286       template< typename SampleType >
00287       class Renderer {
00288         public:
00289           Renderer ( MonophonyType *_monophony, Buffer< SampleType > *_buffer ) : monophony ( _monophony ), buffer ( _buffer ) {}
00290           void operator() ( const tbb::blocked_range<unsigned int> &_r ) const {
00291             unsigned int index;
00292             for ( index = _r.begin(); index != _r.end(); index++ ) {
00293               MonophonyType &current_monophony = monophony[ index ];
00294               Buffer< SampleType > &current_buffer = buffer[ index ];
00295               if ( current_monophony.getStatus() != Note::NOTE_WAIT ) {
00296                 current_buffer.reset();
00297                 current_monophony ( current_buffer );
00298                 bool end_flag = current_buffer.shouldEnd();
00299                 if ( end_flag )
00300                   current_monophony.noteWait();
00301                 current_buffer.setUsed();
00302               }
00303             }
00304           }
00305         private:
00306           MonophonyType * const monophony;
00307           Buffer< SampleType > * const buffer;
00308       };
00313       inline int getNewMonophony() {
00314         int index;
00315         for ( index = 0; index != max_polyphony; index++ )
00316           if ( monophony[ index ].getStatus() == Note::NOTE_WAIT )
00317             return index;
00318         return -1;
00319       }
00324       inline int killOldMonophony() {
00325         int oldest_monophony = -1;
00326         unsigned int oldest_time = current_note_id;
00327         int index;
00328         for ( index = 0; index != max_polyphony; index++ )
00329           if ( active_since[ index ] <= oldest_time ) {
00330             if ( monophony[ index ].getStatus() == Note::NOTE_OFF ) {
00331               oldest_monophony = index;
00332               oldest_time = active_since[ index ];
00333             }
00334           }
00335         if ( oldest_monophony != -1 )
00336           return oldest_monophony;
00337         else {
00338           for ( index = 0; index != max_polyphony; index++ )
00339             if ( active_since[ index ] <= oldest_time ) {
00340               oldest_monophony = index;
00341               oldest_time = active_since[ index ];
00342             }
00343           monophony[ oldest_monophony ].noteOff();
00344           return oldest_monophony;
00345         }
00346       }
00347       Normalizer< SAMPLING_RATE * 10 > normalizer;
00348       MonophonyType monophony[ max_polyphony ];
00349       unsigned int current_note_id;
00350       float default_pitch;
00351       unsigned int active_since[ max_polyphony ];
00352       CurrentTime clock;
00353   };
00354 }

00356 #endif
